comment_will_be_signed: This comment will be automatically signed when you press Submit button.
comment_not_be_signed: This comment will not be signed when you press Submit button.
deflection_message:
To get the most out of Zignatures, consider the following best practices:

  1. Leverage Zendesk Placeholders and Liquid Syntax to create dynamic and conditional signatures.
  2. Keep your signature HTML code concise and well-structured.
  3. Store your signature code in a Zendesk Dynamic Content Record .
  4. Reference that Dynamic Content Record in your Zignatures settings.

This ensures your custom HTML is rendered correctly within Zendesk.

If you have any questions, please contact the app developer for assistance.
